long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Wallpapers is a background selector for setting your favorite images to your dynamic desktop.

CHANGELOG
- Added dynamic wallpaper state icon badge [1/2/3/4].
- Added auto dynamic wallpaper update [6 Hours].
- Added set dynamic wallpaper.
- Added 100 HD dynamic wallpapers [Night/Morning/Afternoon/Evening].
- Added dynamic wallpaper preview [5 seconds].
- Added image slider [Previous/Next].
